participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Creative and nostalgic, Lila enjoys exploring new places while holding on to her childhood joys.
participant_1.background: I buy myself nice paper products to make myself feel like a kid again. I have two cats. My family is a family of storytellers, and we are all passionate about sharing our stories with the world. I used to travel the USA playing guitar. I'm happy to have a beautiful home and get to share my passion for gaming with others.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and a bit self-deprecating, Ethan loves music and enjoys spending time with his family and pets.
participant_2.background: I have a brother and sister, but I'm closer to my brother. I'm a bad boyfriend, but I love my cats. I am a violinist. I once got a paper cut on my finger while delivering a shipment to a university. I enjoy being active, and my family is always up for an adventure.

content.text: Not much, just got back from a trip to Japan.
Oh nice! I've always wanted to go to Japan! What was your favorite part?
I loved the food! I ate so much sushi and ramen.
I bet! I love sushi! What's your favorite kind?
I'm a sucker for anything with eel in it.
Me too! Eel is so good.
Did you do anything fun on your trip?
I went to a lot of concerts and museums.
Oh cool! I love going to concerts.
Me too! I saw my favorite band, The Killers, in Tokyo.
That's awesome! I love The Killers!
They were amazing! I'm so glad I got to see them.
Me too! I'm sure you had an amazing time on your trip.
I did! I'm already planning my next trip.
I hope you have a great time on your next trip!
